post.body: Both :-D
How about a toaster/ wafflemaker that gives you life advice and relationship coaching?
I know. I have ended My Life In Frame and am working on a new series. The site is only down for a bit. I ordered 1 for u already.
WTF?
good luck! I's not a bad experience at all.
sounds just like my christmas so far
G'night world. See ya in a few hours.
I figured out my why car doesnnt want to work, it's not a lemon it's just in beta.
Today is a nothin' but work day. Time to head to my office (Starbucks)
The game... it sounds weird if i dont mention that
Aaaand I just got Left 4 Dead, It's like christmas came early for me.
copy and past kinda working on your iphone and no need to jailbreak it. http://tinyurl.com/5vff85
upgraded my graphics card 9800GTX2 on a mac :-)
Yay wordpress 2.7 is out. Time to get a little coding in before passing out again.
wake up - eat coffee cake - take bath - take nap
A really neat music video shot entirely on an iphone. http://www.goshone.com/?p=74 worth a look.
Time to get some real work done...
Helvetica is so awesome
Wishing it would snow. Oh, who am I kiding? I Live in Florida. :-(
Blogging: never before have so many people with so little to say, said to much to so few.
At starbucks getting some coding done.
Working hard on a new wordpress design
Bond. James Bond.
Heading down to miami to do some photography for an art gallery.
Yay my book is being published :-) Just a few days until the copies arrive.
nervous... going to apply to OCAD
Time to start drawing
Damn I can't spell.
http://twitpic.com/t01b The new work at home setup. :-) Great for playing Left 4 Dread.
Now more coffe, then work. Got a deadline to make tonight for a poster design.
But first. Coffee.
Tossing around ideas for a new comic
Stealing neighbors unsecure wifi. Ah, I love un-tech-savvy people sometimes
Have no Internet. Going insane. So far insanity held at bay by iphone. Won't last long.
Saw a man on a bike in a wendy's drive-thru today
http://twitpic.com/wgjt
Family is coming over... RUN!
It's gonna be a rainy Christmas
Website done, time to sleep
Got a bitchin' new sketchbook
Time to debug some code.
Awesome new Apple ads http://www.apple.com/getamac/ads/
w00t! New Camera
Time to launch a website
I love working Freelance
Woot! Just landed new job. :-)
Turns out he wanted to ask me about the new macbook
Why do people keep coming up to me while I'm working and drinking my coffee?
At the office (Starbucks)
Why does everything have to be out of stock everywhere?
shit.
